channel.title: Very basic questions
channel.description:
Hello, i am quiet new to this and have some questions. How do i edit the most basic things for my 'Insidia RSPS'? Do i need to have an SQL setup for the server to run properly? IS someone willing to add me on skype to help me when i have another question? =)
Thank, Benjamin

item.title: Very basic questions
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Yes, rankings have been already created. If you’re wondering how to change your rank, look around in the character file for something called ‘player-rights’.

Read full topic

item.title: Very basic questions
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin_Db Benjamin Db
item.description:
@Benjamin_Db wrote:

Thank you, and where would i create certaint rankinks like admin, mod, and donator for example? Or have they already been created?

Read full topic

item.title: Very basic questions
item.dc:creator: @Bl3nd Bl3nd
item.description:
@Bl3nd wrote:

Usually they are stored in the ‘data’ folder. I’m assuming that Insidia stores all that stuff in a txt file rather than another file that you can’t load.

Read full topic

item.title: Very basic questions
item.dc:creator: @Benjamin_Db Benjamin Db
item.description:
@Benjamin_Db wrote:

When a player logs in, can i see and edit his stats/items/etc? and where would i be able too find it?
Or is that SQL based?

Read full topic

item.title: Very basic questions
item.dc:creator: @Ashi Ashi
item.description:
@Ashi wrote:

Benjamin Db:

How do i edit the most basic things for my ‘Insidia RSPS’?

Client.java

Benjamin Db:

Do i need to have an SQL setup for the server to run properly?

No.

Benjamin Db:

IS someone willing to add me on skype to help me when i have another question? =)

No. You can freely make another thread or reply to this one if you have more problems.

Read full topic
